sources.title: The Mighty Kong (1998)
sources.description: A family friendly, animated musical of the original King Kong story. Voiced by acting talents Dudley Moore and Jodi Benson

metadata.Plot: Ann Darrow, a down-on-her-luck actress looking for work, meeting film director Carl Denham, who offers her a job in a new movie. They board the Venture to leave for the film shoot. The monkey that lives on board causes trouble throughout the trip. They arrive on the island and the natives, who are friendly to the crew, ask that the crew leave Ann so they can sacrifice her. Ann is then sacrificed to the giant ape King Kong who makes off with her into the jungle.
metadata.Writer: William J. Keenan, Merian C. Cooper, James Ashmore Creelman
metadata.Actors: Dudley Moore, Jodi Benson, Randy Hamilton
